评论概述: Very pretty color, but not crazy about fabric.
评论详情: Color, design and fit are all fantastic!  However, after sitting in my closet for months, without being worn, I have decided to give this shirt to a friend.  I don't love the fabric.  It's a very heavy polyester/synthetic fabric that does not breathe!  Every time I thought about wearing this, I put it back because I knew I'd regret it.  Top is very pretty, and very well made - maybe even a bit big for the size - but I just couldn't get past the heavy synthetic fabric.
This is a very thin blouse but very flattering on and was purchased at a great price.
Ordered a large and it was too big. The color in pic looks more of brown and cream. The blouse is more of a mustard and cream.

I tried it on as soon as I received it.  The blouse runs true to size.  I ordered the tan & navy & the colors are exactly that, a perfect tan & navy.  I will order it again in a different color.  This blouse is nice enough to give as a gift & well worth the money…perfect quality & comfort!
The blouse is made with great fabric and feels so soft.  It is very flattering to wear. It fits true to size. I highly recommend this blouse. It will make you feel so happy!

评论概述: Soooo cute and fit is perfect. Quality fabric and workmanship.
评论详情: Fits perfectly. Very cute. Great fabric. Great workmanship. Great price !

Nice top. 100% polyester but and doesn’t have a plastic feel some polyester material can have. I did size up one and I’m glad I did- it fits in shoulder, is a relaxed fit in body and good length. I wouldn’t want to wear it any shorter (about 2”  below waistband) since I wouldn’t be able to raise my arms without showing skin. The buttons do have a bit of a gap so it may require an under layer.  The flowers are a deep rust/red in color on a cream background.

评论概述: Must wear a tank top underneath
评论详情: Keeping due to the sale price, but a tank top is necessary underneath if you’re wearing this shirt to work because the eyelet holes go pretty far down. Traditionally a medium, but I could have gotten a small.
Really like this blouse!  True to size and launders beautifully with no wrinkles.

I really like the cut, style and material of this top. It's flowy for the boho vibe and the material is light without being see-through or feeling cheap. The sleeves hang nice and loose to my wrists and the rest of the material at the waist can be left loose or tucked in. Even the print is cute and unlike anything I've purchased before. If boho is your style, this top is for you.
